data.title: Portable Dual Arduino (TM) Micro XPlorerBoard by Rich Electronics — Kickstarter
data.name: Rich Electronics
data.description: The Portable XPlorerBoard lets you plug in 2 Arduino Micros for your projects and eliminates loose parts with its built in components.

data.title: Circuit Scribe: Draw Circuits Instantly by Electroninks Incorporated — Kickstarter
data.name: Electroninks Incorporated
data.description: Circuit Scribe is a rollerball pen that writes with conductive silver ink.  It makes creating circuits as easy as doodling.

data.title: 1Sheeld: Replace your Arduino shields with your smartphone! by Integreight, Inc. — Kickstarter
data.name: Integreight, Inc.
data.description: Imagine an Arduino shield that can be configured to be an LCD, GPS, Wifi, or any shield you may think of!
